column1: The Roman Catholic Diocese of Amparo (Latin: Dioecesis Amparensis) is a diocese located in the city of Amparo in the Ecclesiastical province of Campinas in Brazil.

column2: 1997: Established as Diocese of Amparo from the Metropolitan Archdiocese of Campinas and Diocese of Limeira

column1: Pedro Carlos Cipolini (14 Jul 2010  – 6 Jan 2016); formerly of the clergy of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Campinas
column2: Brazil; up until now pastor of the Cathedral Basilica "Nossa Senhora de Carmo" and Professor of Theology at the Pontifical Catholic University; born in Caconde
column3: Brazil in 1952 and ordained a priest in 1978
